refsect2.title: The "jabber-receiving-iq" signal
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean user_function (PurpleConnection *gc, const char *type, const char *id, const char *from, PurpleXmlNode *iq, gpointer user_data)
refsect2.para: Emitted when an XMPP IQ stanza is received. Allows a plugin to process IQ stanzas.

listitem.simpara: The connection on which the stanza is received.
The IQ type ('get', 'set', 'result', or 'error').
The ID attribute from the stanza. MUST NOT be NULL.
The originator of the stanza. MAY BE NULL if the stanza originated from the user's server.
The full stanza received.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.
TRUE if the plugin processed this stanza and *nobody else* should process it. FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: The "jabber-receiving-message" signal
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean user_function (PurpleConnection *gc, const char *type, const char *id, const char *from, const char *to, PurpleXmlNode *message, gpointer user_data)
refsect2.para: Emitted when an XMPP message stanza is received. Allows a plugin to process message stanzas.

listitem.simpara: The connection on which the stanza is received.
The message type (see rfc3921 or rfc3921bis).
The ID attribute from the stanza. MAY BE NULL.
The originator of the stanza. MAY BE NULL if the stanza originated from the user's server.
The destination of the stanza. This is probably either the full JID of the receiver or the receiver's bare JID.
The full stanza received.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.
TRUE if the plugin processed this stanza and *nobody else* should process it. FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: The "jabber-receiving-presence" signal
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean user_function (PurpleConnection *gc, const char *type, const char *from, PurpleXmlNode *presence, gpointer user_data)
refsect2.para: Emitted when an XMPP presence stanza is received. Allows a plugin to process presence stanzas.

listitem.simpara: The connection on which the stanza is received.
The presence type (see rfc3921 or rfc3921bis). NULL indicates this is an "available" (i.e. online) presence.
The originator of the stanza. MAY BE NULL if the stanza originated from the user's server.
The full stanza received.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.
TRUE if the plugin processed this stanza and *nobody else* should process it. FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: The "jabber-watched-iq" signal
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean user_function (PurpleConnection *gc, const char *type, const char *id, const char *from, PurpleXmlNode *child, gpointer user_data)
refsect2.para: Emitted when an IQ with a watched (child, namespace) pair is received. See jabber-register-namespace-watcher and jabber-unregister-namespace-watcher.

listitem.simpara: The connection on which the stanza is received.
The IQ type ('get', 'set', 'result', or 'error').
The ID attribute from the stanza. MUST NOT be NULL.
The originator of the stanza. MAY BE NULL if the stanza originated from the user's server.
The child node with namespace.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.
TRUE if the plugin processed this stanza and *nobody else* should process it. FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: The "jabber-register-namespace-watcher" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (const char *node, const char *namespace, gpointer user_data)
refsect2.para: Emit this signal to register your desire to have specific IQ stanzas to be emitted via the jabber-watched-iq signal when received.

listitem.simpara: The IQ child name to longer watch.
The IQ child namespace to longer watch.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The "jabber-unregister-namespace-watcher" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (const char *node, const char *namespace, gpointer user_data)
refsect2.para: Emit this signal to unregister your desire to have specific IQ stanzas to be emitted via the jabber-watched-iq signal when received.

listitem.simpara: The IQ child name to no longer watch.
The IQ child namespace to no longer watch.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The "jabber-sending-xmlnode" signal
refsect2.para: Emit this signal (purple_signal_emit) to send a stanza. It is preferred to use this instead of purple_protocol_server_iface_send_raw.

listitem.simpara: The connection on which to send the stanza.
The stanza to send. If stanza is not NULL after being sent, the emitter should free it.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The "jabber-receiving-xmlnode" signal
refsect2.para: Emitted when an XMPP stanza is received. Allows a plugin to process any stanza.

listitem.simpara: The connection on which the stanza was received.
The received stanza. Set stanza to NULL (and free it) to stop processing the stanza.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.
